## hook catalog update

Adds the given URL to the catalog config.

### Synopsis

update updates a given catalog to the configured revision.

```
hook catalog update <url> [flags]
```

### Examples

```
hook catalog update <name>
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for update
```
